channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- QR Redirector
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- QR Redirector

item.title: CVE-2021-24853|2024-08-03T19:42:17.211Z -- unknown -- qr%20redirector
item.description: The QR Redirector WordPress plugin before 1.6 does not have capability and CSRF checks when saving bulk QR Redirector settings via the qr_save_bulk AJAX action, which could allow any authenticated user, such as subscriber to change the redirect response status code of arbitrary QR Redirects

item.title: CVE-2021-24854|2024-08-03T19:42:17.302Z -- unknown -- qr%20redirector
item.description: The QR Redirector WordPress plugin before 1.6.1 does not sanitise and escape some of the QR Redirect fields, which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
